vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ῥομφαία, ἡ,
large, broad sword, used by the Thracians, ὀρθὰς ῥ. βαρυσιδήρους ἀπὸ τῶν δεξιῶν ὤμων ἐπισείοντες [Refs 3rd c.BC+]: generally, sword, [LXX+NT+4th c.AD+]; of the sword of Goliath, [LXX+1st c.AD+]
__II ={νυκτερίς}, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(long) sword
primarily a Thracian broad-sword; a sword, Rev. 1:16; 2:12; by metonymy war, Rev. 6:8; metaphorically a thrill of anguish, Lk. 2:35
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: (非希臘人使用的一種又大又寬的劍) 劍
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: (非希腊人使用的一种又大又宽的剑) 剑
